data.title: Leon Lai's Adorable Baby Girl
data.meta_description: Leon Lai and his girlfriend/personal assistant, Wing Chan, recently welcomed their new baby last April 23, 2018. The baby was born prematurely and from the recent photo that Leon shared of his baby girl on his social media platforms, she is obviously thriving now that she’s a few months old. Leon Lai introduces his daughter by commenting that she’s really fat and that being ordinary is her luck. To me, she looks adorable even if she seems really pissed in the photo. Haha!  Source: 1
